name: go-enhancements
description: Go-specific analysis enhancements for file summaries
additionalInstructions: Identify ALL exported symbols (capitalized names) and unexported symbols
Note struct definitions with their fields and tags (json:"", xml:"", db:"", etc.)
Document interface definitions and which types implement them
List methods with their receiver types (value receivers vs pointer receivers)
Identify goroutines (go keyword usage) and explain their purpose
Note channel usage (chan, <-chan, chan<-) and their directions
Document defer statements and their purposes
List error handling patterns and custom error types
Note select statements for channel multiplexing
Identify context.Context usage for cancellation and timeouts
Note package-level variables and constants with their purposes
